alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 8:43PM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Hannibal. Mississippi River at Saverton. Mississippi River at Canton. Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Quincy. Mississippi River at Lock & Dam 21. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Louisiana. Mississippi River at LaGrange. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at LaGrange. * WHEN...From Friday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.1 feet, Wharf Street begins flooding at this height just upstream from the Bunge plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 13.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday morning and continue rising to 18.0 feet Saturday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Mississippi River LaGrange 17.0 13.6 15.0 15.6 16.2 17.0 17.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
